answers.answer: Check ur blood pressure when that happens, low or high blood pressure can cause that, also ur sugar levels

I work at a assistent living place. Some of the little old ladies keep their appartment unbearably hot during the summer. Since I have been pregnant I feel light headed when I get too warm or in tight areas. Never had that problem before. My doctor said this is not abnormal, but they did check my iron count and for gestational diabetes. I have taken her advice and make sure I drink lots of water in the morning and healthy snacks throughout the day. Haven't had a problem since.

question: Im 32 weeks and I never had problems why pregnant really but im a server and at work this morning I got super lightheaded like I could pass out I was really pale and hot but I dont know what caused it my boss end up sending me home a couple hours later my doctors is called today does anyone think they know wat could caused it?
title: concern
